objects.text:
• Premium pink lipstick with silver case
• Complementary blush in sleek compact
• Long-lasting, pigment-rich formula
• Perfect for all skin tones

product_details.name: Pink Perfection: Luxe Lipstick & Blush Duo Set
product_details.description:
• Premium pink lipstick with silver metallic casing for elegant application
• Complementary powder blush in sleek black compact with mirror
• Long-lasting, pigment-rich formula for vibrant color payoff
• Travel-friendly size perfect for on-the-go touch-ups
• Matte finish blush for natural-looking flush
• Creamy lipstick texture for smooth, comfortable wear
• Built-in mirror compact for precise application anywhere
• Professional-grade cosmetic set ideal for daily use
• Perfect pink shade suitable for all skin tones
• High-quality packaging ensures product protection

banner_details:
This banner is a promotional design featuring a luxury cosmetic product set. It is divided into four quadrants, each with a distinct pink tone, creating a vibrant and eye-catching layout. The top-left section introduces the product with a bold heading (`heading`) and a sleek subheading (`subheading`), accompanied by a callout for urgency (`tagline`). The top-right quadrant features a realistic, high-quality image of the product (`product_image`). 

In the bottom-left, key product attributes are detailed through a feature list (`description`), alongside striking pricing information (`price`) and a stock scarcity note (`urgency_text`). The bottom-right segment reinforces urgency with a bold call-to-action section, including a compelling urgency title (`urgency_heading`), a "shop now" button (`cta_button_background` & `cta`), and a limited-time reminder (`countdown_text`).

**Color Palette:**
- Light Blush Pink (#FFD6E5)
- Soft Pink (#FFC0D6)
- Vibrant Pink (#FF8AB6)
- Bold Pink (#FF3385)
- Highlight Pink (#FF1476)
- Charcoal Gray (#333333)
- White (#FFFFFF)

This layout uses clean lines, geometric balance, and layered text to attract attention and prompt action.
product_color: The product image showcases a soft, feminine aesthetic through its delicate pink tones paired with bold, sleek packaging. The primary highlight is a vibrant candy pink (#F59AC3), effortlessly echoed in both the blush and lipstick. These pink shades are gently contrasted with the matte black (#1C1C1C) casing, adding sophistication and elevating the modern appeal. A metallic silver (#C0C0C0) on the lipstick tube introduces a luxurious sheen, visually balancing warmth and coolness. The overall color palette is cohesive, minimal, and stylish, ideal for beauty advertisements. Suggested banner colors: Pink (#F59AC3), Black (#1C1C1C), Soft Grey (#D8D8D8), and Silver (#C0C0C0).
